member.summary: Generates layouts for arranging desktop icons in a specific shape.

member.summary: Gets the unique key identifying this shape provider.

member.name: M:SortBySchlong.Core.Interfaces.IShapeProvider.GenerateLayout(System.Int32,SortBySchlong.Core.Models.DesktopBounds)
member.summary: Generates a layout of points representing where icons should be positioned.
member.param: The number of icons to arrange.
The desktop bounds to arrange icons within.
member.returns: A list of points representing icon positions.
member.exception: Thrown when iconCount is less than the minimum required for this shape.
